hero.name: Yash Lahoti BAS, MSE
hero.description: High-performing applicants fail not because they are weak, but because they are indistinguishable. I help you build a professional identity that admissions committees believe in before the application is even read.

about_me.title: The Engineer-Physician
about_me.subtitle: Why This Approach is Different
about_me.name: Yash Lahoti
about_me.credentials: MD Candidate @ Mt. Sinai | MSE Artificial Intelligence @ UPenn
about_me.bio: Most consultants optimize documents; I optimize positioning. Applying 'Systems Engineering' to admissions, I don't just check boxes—I deconstruct your life story into data points, identify the strongest thematic threads, and reassemble them into a compelling argument for your admission.

philosophy.title: The Core Problem
philosophy.subtitle: Why Great Candidates Fail
philosophy.text: They have strong grades, impressive activities, and solid essays—but no identity. No one knows who they are becoming or what role they will play in medicine. Admissions committees select for trajectory, not just credentials. We solve for the 'Indistinguishable Applicant'.

services.title: 1. Narrative Engineering
services.desc: We do not 'write essays.' We define who you are becoming. We identify core intellectual themes and professional direction so every component expresses the same identity.
services.detail: Narrative Engineering is the foundation of identity construction. Instead of treating your personal statement, activities, and secondaries as separate documents, we architect a coherent professional identity that runs through every component. We analyze your life story—your research interests, clinical experiences, leadership roles, and personal motivations—to identify the strongest thematic threads. These threads become the DNA of your application, ensuring that when an admissions committee reads your file, they see not just a collection of achievements, but a clear trajectory toward a specific role in medicine. This coherence is what separates memorable applicants from the indistinguishable crowd.
benefits: Coherent professional identity across all essays
Clear trajectory that admissions committees recognize
Memorable application that stands out from the crowd

services.title: 2. School–Identity Alignment
services.desc: Stop choosing schools by rank. We choose by identity fit—analyzing institutional culture and faculty interests so your application becomes mutually reinforcing.
services.detail: Most applicants create school lists based on rankings and location. This is backwards. We reverse-engineer your school list by first understanding your professional identity, then identifying programs where that identity aligns with institutional values, research strengths, and faculty expertise. We analyze each school's culture, mission, and recent initiatives to find genuine fit. When your narrative aligns with a school's priorities, your application becomes mutually reinforcing—the school sees you as someone who will contribute to their community, and you present yourself as someone who belongs there. This strategic alignment dramatically increases your chances of acceptance because you're not just another high-stat applicant; you're a future colleague who fits.
benefits: Strategic school list based on genuine fit
Mutually reinforcing application narrative
Higher acceptance rates at target programs

services.title: 3. Strategic Outreach
services.desc: The game changer. We guide you to build early relationships with faculty and initiate research collaborations. You will not be anonymous.
services.detail: Strategic Outreach transforms you from an anonymous applicant to a known quantity. We teach you how to engage with faculty and departments at your target programs before you apply. This includes identifying relevant research opportunities, reaching out to faculty whose work aligns with your interests, and initiating meaningful conversations that can lead to collaborations or mentorship. When you apply, you're not just a name on a file—you're someone who has already demonstrated initiative, intellectual curiosity, and professional maturity. Faculty who know your work can advocate for you during admissions discussions. This inside advocacy is one of the most powerful differentiators in medical school admissions, and it's something that most applicants never attempt.
benefits: Advocacy inside target programs before applying
Early relationships with faculty and departments
You're a known quantity, not anonymous

services.title: 4. Professional Positioning
services.desc: You enter the medical community early through conferences, publications, and initiatives. Your application reflects an identity that already exists in the field.
services.detail: Professional Positioning means entering the medical community before medical school. We help you present at conferences, publish research, launch initiatives, and build a professional presence that demonstrates your identity is not aspirational—it's already real. When you present at a national conference, publish in a peer-reviewed journal, or launch a healthcare initiative, you're not just listing activities; you're demonstrating that your professional identity exists independently of the application process. Admissions committees see someone who is already contributing to the field, not someone who hopes to contribute someday. This positioning makes your application compelling because it shows trajectory, not just potential. You're not asking for permission to enter medicine; you're demonstrating that you're already part of the community.
benefits: Professional identity that already exists in the field
Demonstrated contributions through conferences and publications
Application shows trajectory, not just potential

items.question: This sounds different than normal advising. Is it?
items.answer: Yes. Most consultants edit what you have. I help you build what you are missing. We focus on identity and positioning inside the profession, which is an entirely different market.

items.question: What is 'Strategic Outreach'?
items.answer: It is the process of creating visibility inside your target programs before you apply. We teach you how to engage faculty and departments so you have advocates on the inside.

testimonials.title: Testimonials
testimonials.subtitle: What students say about working with me

items.quote: Yash's engineering approach to my application completely transformed how I presented my story. I got accepted to my top choice medical school!
The strategic narrative development helped me stand out in a competitive pool. His AI background brings a unique perspective to admissions consulting.
Working with Yash was a game-changer. His systems engineering approach helped me craft a compelling application that got me multiple acceptances.
